title: City Mayors: Kadir Topbas - Mayor of Istanbul

quotes: Topbas was first elected in the 2004 elections for the mayoralty of Greater Istanbul on behalf of the governing Justice and Development Party.
He received a second term in the 2009 local elections, albeit having faced a close challenge from a left of centre opponent.
In 2007 he became co-president of the United Cities and Local Governments organisation.
